Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event hosted by Muslimahs Club.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Event entity.

date.description: Date and time of the event.

location.description: Location of the event (physical or online).

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the event.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a testimonial from a member.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Testimonial entity.

authorName.description: Name of the author of the testimonial.

content.description: The text content of the testimonial.

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents a member of the Muslimahs Club team.

id.description: Unique identifier for the TeamMember entity.

title.description: Title or role of the team member.

bio.description: Short biography of the team member.

imageUrl.description: URL of the team member's image.

ForumPost.title: ForumPost
ForumPost.description: Represents a question and its conversation thread in the open forum.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ForumPost entity.

authorName.description: Name of the user who posted the question.

replies.description: A list of replies in the conversation thread.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the question was posted.

ForumReply.title: ForumReply
ForumReply.description: Represents a single reply within a forum post thread.

id.description: Unique client-generated identifier for the reply.

reply.description: The text content of the reply.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the reply was posted.

definition.description: Stores events.  Administrators can create, read, update, and delete events.

params.name: eventId
params.description: The unique identifier for the event.

definition.description: Stores testimonials. Administrators can create, read, update, and delete testimonials.

params.name: testimonialId
params.description: The unique identifier for the testimonial.

definition.description: Stores team members. Administrators can create, read, update, and delete team members.

params.name: teamMemberId
params.description: The unique identifier for the team member.

definition.description: Stores forum posts. Anyone can create posts and replies. Admins can moderate all content.

params.name: forumPostId
params.description: The unique identifier for the forum post.

definition.description: Collection to store admin roles. The existence of a document for a user ID in this collection grants admin privileges.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user who is an admin.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to support the Muslimahs Club application, focusing on ease of management for events, testimonials, team members, and an open forum. The primary goal is to create a structure that is secure, scalable, and facilitates simple security rules. The forum is designed to be open for public contributions, with full moderation capabilities reserved for administrators.
